_header: Alas for lack of her presence
Note:
Cf. 2230; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 95.
_description: On the absence of his mistress — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd5465.First Lines: Alas for lak of her presens…
